languages.text: Leaving AoO zone wearer automatically pushes enemy 1 cell away before their attack

traits.locale_text: Leaving AoO zone wearer automatically pushes enemy 1 cell away before their attack

languages.text: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer leaves a threatened area, they push the enemy 1 cell away before that enemy could make their attack of opportunity.
Whenever the wearer leaves a threatened area, they push the enemy 1 cell away before that enemy could make their attack of opportunity.
Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.
Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo intenta lanzar un ataque de oportunidad contra el portador, el enemigo es empujado 1 casilla antes de que el ataque pueda alcanzar al portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo intenta lanzar un ataque de oportunidad contra el portador, el enemigo es empujado 1 casilla antes de que el ataque pueda alcanzar al portador.
Cuando el portador sale de un área de peligro, empuja a los enemigos 1 casilla. Esto sucede antes de que los enemigos puedan lanzar ningún ataque de oportunidad.

languages.text: 敵が使用者に対して機会攻撃を行おうとするたび、その攻撃が使用者に命中する前に、その敵は1セル後退する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 敵が使用者に対して機会攻撃を行おうとするたび、その攻撃が使用者に命中する前に、その敵は1セル後退する。
使用者が脅威エリアから離れるたび、あらゆる敵を1セル分ノックバックする。これは敵が機会攻撃を実行する前に発生する。

languages.text: 当敌人试图通过借机攻击攻击装备者时，该敌人会被击退1格。此效果会在敌人进行借机攻击之前生效。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人试图通过借机攻击攻击装备者时，该敌人会被击退1格。此效果会在敌人进行借机攻击之前生效。
当装备者离开敌人的威胁区域时，会将所有敌人击退1格。此效果会在敌人进行借机攻击之前生效。

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi tente une attaque d'opportunité contre le porteur, il est repoussé de 1 case avant même que l'attaque n'atteigne sa cible.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi tente une attaque d'opportunité contre le porteur, il est repoussé de 1 case avant même que l'attaque n'atteigne sa cible.
Chaque fois qu'un ennemi tente une attaque d'opportunité contre le porteur, il est repoussé de 1 case avant même que l'attaque n'atteigne sa cible.

languages.text: Attackiert ein Gegner den Träger mit einem Gelegenheitsangriff, wird er 1 Zelle zurückgeworfen, ehe der Angriff den Träger treffen kann.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Attackiert ein Gegner den Träger mit einem Gelegenheitsangriff, wird er 1 Zelle zurückgeworfen, ehe der Angriff den Träger treffen kann.

languages.text: Когда противник пытается совершить против персонажа атаку по возможности, персонаж отталкивает этого противника на 1 клетку, прежде чем тот успеет нанести удар.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer leaves a threatened area, they push any enemies back 1 cell. This occurs before enemies are able to perform attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: Покидая область угрозы, персонаж отталкивает противников на 1 клетку, прежде чем эти противники смогут совершить атаку по возможности.
Покидая область угрозы, персонаж отталкивает противников на 1 клетку, прежде чем эти противники смогут совершить атаку по возможности.
